languages.text: "Информация об инцидентах обнаружена в каталоге. Инциденты признаны незначимыми. Техническое дознание постановило, что наиболее вероятной причиной сбоев были грех кощунственной халатности, допущенный в процессе обряда лоботомирования. Сие постыдное небрежение дает теням мыслей и воспоминаний сервитора затаиться в уголках его разума, посвященного служению".

traits.locale_text: "Я осведомлен о связанных с ними инцидентах". {n}В задумчивости жрец делает паузу.{/n} "Сервиторы несовершенны. Если процесс лаботомирования был проведен небрежно, в редких случаях бледные тени мыслей и воспоминаний прошлого могут привести к разного рода сбоям. В редких случаях. Сервиторы на корабле выходят за рамки своих протоколов слишком часто. Я не могу уследить в этом признаков техноереси, но точно заключаю — их состояние вызывает опасение".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."
languages.original_text: "Информация об инцидентах обнаружена в каталоге. Инциденты признаны незначимыми. Техническое дознание постановило, что наиболее вероятной причиной сбоев были грех кощунственной халатности, допущенный в процессе обряда лоботомирования. Сие постыдное небрежение дает теням мыслей и воспоминаний сервитора затаиться в уголках его разума, посвященного служению".

This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Se ha encontrado información de esos incidentes en el catálogo. Los incidentes se han considerado insignificantes. Una consulta técnica ha determinado que la causa estadísticamente probable de los errores fue una infracción de negligencia sacrílega durante el rito de lobotomización. Esta deshonrosa fechoría ha permitido que una sombra de los pensamientos y recuerdos del servidor haya sobrevivido en las profundidades de su mente, la cual debería estar consagrada únicamente a servir».
languages.original_text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha encontrado información de esos incidentes en el catálogo. Los incidentes se han considerado insignificantes. Una consulta técnica ha determinado que la causa estadísticamente probable de los errores fue una infracción de negligencia sacrílega durante el rito de lobotomización. Esta deshonrosa fechoría ha permitido que una sombra de los pensamientos y recuerdos del servidor haya sobrevivido en las profundidades de su mente, la cual debería estar consagrada únicamente a servir».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「事件に関する情報がカタログの中から検出された。これらの事件は些末なものであると認知されている。技術的な調査の結果、統計的にもっとも可能性の高いエラーの原因は、ロボトミー手術の儀式中の冒涜的な過失であることが判明した。この不名誉な不正行為によって、奉仕のためだけに捧げられるべき心の奥底に、サーヴィターの思考や回想の影が残ってしまったようだ」
languages.original_text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."

traits.locale_text: 「事件に関する情報がカタログの中から検出された。これらの事件は些末なものであると認知されている。技術的な調査の結果、統計的にもっとも可能性の高いエラーの原因は、ロボトミー手術の儀式中の冒涜的な過失であることが判明した。この不名誉な不正行為によって、奉仕のためだけに捧げられるべき心の奥底に、サーヴィターの思考や回想の影が残ってしまったようだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “关于这些事件的信息，可在目录中查询。这些事件已被认定为无关紧要。技术调查已经确定这些错误的原因，从统计上来看，最可能的是在额叶切除仪式期间的亵渎性疏忽。这种可耻的渎职行为，让这位机仆的心灵深处依然残留着原本的思想与回忆，而他的心灵本应只专注于服务才对。”
languages.original_text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."

traits.locale_text: “关于这些事件的信息，可在目录中查询。这些事件已被认定为无关紧要。技术调查已经确定这些错误的原因，从统计上来看，最可能的是在额叶切除仪式期间的亵渎性疏忽。这种可耻的渎职行为，让这位奴工的心灵深处依然残留着原本的思想与回忆，而他的心灵本应只专注于服务才对。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Des informations sur ces incidents ont été détectées dans le catalogue, mais ces derniers ont été jugés insignifiants. Une enquête technique a établi que l'origine des erreurs la plus statistiquement probable était une transgression d'une négligence sacrilège lors du rite de lobotomie. Ce méfait honteux a permis la survie de reliquats de pensées et de souvenir dans les tréfonds de l'esprit du servitor, alors qu'il aurait dû être entièrement dévoué au service de ses maîtres. »
languages.original_text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."

traits.locale_text: « Des informations sur ces incidents ont été détectées dans le catalogue, mais ces derniers ont été jugés insignifiants. Une enquête technique a établi que l'origine des erreurs la plus statistiquement probable était une transgression d'une négligence sacrilège lors du rite de lobotomie. Ce méfait honteux a permis la survie de reliquats de pensées et de souvenir dans les tréfonds de l'esprit du servitor, alors qu'il aurait dû être entièrement dévoué au service de ses maîtres. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Informationen über die Vorfälle wurden im Katalog lokalisiert. Die Vorfälle wurden als unbedeutend eingestuft. Eine technische Abfrage hat ergeben, dass die statistisch wahrscheinlichste Ursache für die Fehler frevelhafte Fahrlässigkeit während des Ritus der Lobotomie war. Durch diesen schändlichen Akt des Fehlverhaltens konnten Schatten der Gedanken und Erinnerungen des Servitors in den Tiefen seines Verstands überleben, der eigentlich allein dem Dienst vorbehalten sein sollte."
languages.original_text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."

traits.locale_text: "Informationen über die Vorfälle wurden im Katalog lokalisiert. Die Vorfälle wurden als unbedeutend eingestuft. Eine technische Abfrage hat ergeben, dass die statistisch wahrscheinlichste Ursache für die Fehler frevelhafte Fahrlässigkeit während des Ritus der Lobotomie war. Durch diesen schändlichen Akt des Fehlverhaltens konnten Schatten der Gedanken und Erinnerungen des Servitors in den Tiefen seines Verstands überleben, der eigentlich allein dem Dienst vorbehalten sein sollte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."

languages.text: "Katalogda, yaşanan olaylara dair bilgiler tespit edildi. Olayların önemsiz olduğu kanısına varıldı. Teknik bir değerlendirme, bu hataların istatistiksel olarak en muhtemel sebebinin lobotomi ayini sırasında gerçekleştirilen, hürmetsizce ihmalkârlıklar olduğunu gösteriyor. Görevi kötüye kullanmaya dair bu utanç verici durum, yalnızca hizmet etmeye adanması gereken hizmetörlerin zihinlerinin derinliklerinde düşünce ve anılara dair gölgelerin varlığını sürdürmesine neden olmuş."
languages.original_text: "Information about the incidents has been detected in the catalogue. The incidents have been acknowledged as insignificant. A technical enquiry has established that the most statistically likely cause of the errors was a transgression of sacrilegious negligence during the lobotomising rite. This disgraceful act of malfeasance has allowed shadows of the servitor's thoughts and recollections to survive in the depths of its mind, which ought to be dedicated to service alone."

traits.locale_text: "Katalogda, yaşanan olaylarla ilgili bilgiler tespit edildi. Olayların önemsiz olduğu kanısına varıldı. Teknik bir değerlendirme gösteriyor ki, bu hataların istatistiksel olarak en muhtemel sebebi, lobotomi ayini sırasında gerçekleştirilen saygısızca ihmalkârlıklar imiş. Bu görevi utanç verici bir şekilde kötüye kullanma durumu, yalnızca hizmet etmeye adanması gereken hizmetörlerin zihinlerinin derinliklerinde, düşüncelere ve anılara dair gölgelerin hayatta kalmasına neden olmuş."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
